messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/29/2002 11:09:02 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... GIVE HIM SOME ICE CREAM!!! Kate Davis, who wants somebody, somewhere, to commiserate with
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/29/2002 11:09:02 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:


> I actually do that with Jalen regularly, he's not very willing to try
> anything the first time (heck, he's only one y.o.) so I put a little on his
>
> lip and after he tastes it he ends up gobbling the entire bowl down.
> Sometimes Moms really can know best!! I would never try to make him eat
> something he truly didn't want.
> Ren
>

GIVE HIM SOME ICE CREAM!!!

Kate Davis, who wants somebody, somewhere, to commiserate with her


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
